paragraphs.text:
%md
#### Demonstrates a Redshift to S3 incremental unload by timestamp

* Uses Glue Dynamic frames for UNLOAD from Redshift
* Incremental checkpointing to DynamoDB for each run
* Writes output to Parquet in S3 partitioned by chosen columns
* Updates checkpoint in DynamoDB after each run
* Add partition to Glue catalog using Athena APIs

msg.data:
Demonstrates a Redshift to S3 incremental unload by timestamp

  • Uses Glue Dynamic frames for UNLOAD from Redshift
  • Incremental checkpointing to DynamoDB for each run
  • Writes output to Parquet in S3 partitioned by chosen columns
  • Updates checkpoint in DynamoDB after each run
  • Add partition to Glue catalog using Athena APIs

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
## GlueNotebook1 - Unload data from Redshift to S3 in Parquet.
print spark.version
sys.argv=["redshift2s3-incr.py","--JOB_NAME","Redshift2S3","--TempDir","s3://neilawsglue/temp"]

%pyspark
import sys, boto3, datetime, time
from awsglue.transforms import *
from awsglue.utils import getResolvedOptions
from pyspark.context import SparkContext
from awsglue.context import GlueContext
from awsglue.job import Job
from pyspark.sql.functions import UserDefinedFunction
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
from awsglue.gluetypes import ArrayType, NullType, StructType



args = getResolvedOptions(sys.argv, ['TempDir','JOB_NAME'])

sc=sc if 'sc' in vars() else SparkContext()
glueContext = GlueContext(sc)
spark = glueContext.spark_session
job = Job(glueContext)
job.init(args['JOB_NAME'], args)

%pyspark
## Function: Get Last Checkpoint from DynamoDB
def getLastCheckPoint (client, tablename):
   response = client.get_item(TableName='ETL_CHECKPOINT', Key={'TABLE_NAME':{'S':tablename}})
   checkpoint= response['Item']['CHECKPOINT']['S']
   return checkpoint
 
## Function: Update Checkpoint in DynamoDB
def updateCheckPoint (client,tablename, checkpoint, lastcheckpoint, status):
   response = client.put_item(TableName='ETL_CHECKPOINT', Item={'TABLE_NAME':{'S':tablename},
   	'CHECKPOINT':{'S':checkpoint}, 'LAST_CHECKPOINT':{'S':lastcheckpoint},'STATUS':{'S':status} })
   return True

%pyspark
### *** CHANGE THESE VARIABLES *** ###
region='us-east-1'
glue_endpoint_url="https://glue.us-east-1.amazonaws.com"

source_database='RedShift'
source_table='redshiftdb4_public_sales_order_fact'

target_database='spectrum'
target_table='SALES_ORDER_FACT_EXT_PQ'

## Specify a writable S3 location
s3_output_location="s3://neilawstemp/dataset232"

%pyspark
dynamodb = boto3.client('dynamodb',region_name='us-east-1')
checkpoint = getLastCheckPoint(dynamodb,target_table)
checkpoint_date = datetime.datetime.strptime(checkpoint, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
#print checkpoint_date
newcheckpoint = checkpoint_date + datetime.timedelta(days=1)
print "Last checkpoint : "+ str(checkpoint)
print "New checkpoint : "+ str(newcheckpoint)

%pyspark
datasource1 = glueContext.create_dynamic_frame.from_catalog(database = source_database, table_name = source_table,  redshift_tmp_dir = args["TempDir"],transformation_ctx = "datasource1")
datasource1.printSchema()
#datasource1.toDF().count()
filtered_df=datasource1.toDF().filter(col("ORDER_DATE") == checkpoint)

msg.data:
root
|-- order_id: int
|-- site_id: int
|-- order_date: timestamp
|-- date_key: string
|-- ship_mode: string
|-- line_id: int
|-- line_number: int
|-- quantity: int
|-- product_id: int
|-- unit_price: decimal
|-- discount: decimal
|-- supply_cost: decimal
|-- tax: decimal
|-- extended_price: decimal
|-- profit: decimal

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
year_udf = UserDefinedFunction(lambda x :x.year, IntegerType())
month_udf = UserDefinedFunction(lambda x : x.month, IntegerType())
day_udf = UserDefinedFunction(lambda x : x.day, IntegerType())

df1=filtered_df.withColumn("year",year_udf("ORDER_DATE")).withColumn("month",month_udf("ORDER_DATE")).withColumn("day",day_udf("ORDER_DATE"))
df1.show(10)

%pyspark
partitionby = ['year','month','day']
codec='snappy'
df1.repartition(*partitionby).write.partitionBy(partitionby).mode("append").parquet(s3_output_location, compression=codec)

updateCheckPoint(dynamodb,target_table, str(newcheckpoint),str(checkpoint),'COMPLETED')

print "Rows unloaded to S3 from Redshift table: redshiftdb4_public_sales_order_fact : "+str(df1.count())

msg.data: Rows unloaded to S3 from Redshift table: redshiftdb4_public_sales_order_fact : 3724

ALTER TABLE SALES_ORDER_FACT_EXT_PQ  ADD PARTITION (year=2015,month=1,day=18) location "s3://neilawstemp/dataset232/year=2015/month=1/day=18"
Athena Query Status: SUCCEEDED

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
start_millis = int(round(time.time() * 1000))
queryString='MSCK REPAIR TABLE SALES_ORDER_FACT_EXT_PQ'
executeAthenaQuery(queryString)
end_millis = int(round(time.time() * 1000))
print "elapsed: "+str(end_millis-start_millis)+" ms."
